about_the_game:
The grim wasteland of the post-apocalypse never sounded so... grim. It's pretty grim. Except for two catchy songs and an instrumental echoing the nostalgia of a future that never came to pass! And one hopeful guitar theme. Otherwise, grim. This return to Doomsday presents twenty more tracks of dystopian darkness from composer Joel Steudler. WAST Radio is also back on the air with five bonus broadcasts, and you'll find five drones to offer apocalyptic atmosphere.


Contents:

- 20 BGM tracks suitable for battles, dungeons, themes, and towns!
- 5 Radio broadcasts suitable for a wasteland radio station
- 5 disturbing drones for your apocalyptic world
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
